definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: My mother and I get the basket into the orchard and the scissors.
sentences.chinese: 我和媽媽領取提籃和剪子進入果園。

sentences.english: The couple both personally operation, the street level, Basket salesman.
sentences.chinese: 他們夫妻倆親自操作，走街串巷，提籃叫賣。

sentences.english: But the housekeeper lingered by the door, and the basket stayed shut.
sentences.chinese: 可這時女管家卻一個勁地在門外徘徊，提籃也緊閉着。

sentences.english: Basket cord tote bag with smooth leather trims.
sentences.chinese: 大號提籃式購物包，光滑皮革包邊。

definition: waistband of a skirt/(fig.) related to the wife or another female family member
to present a treasure/to offer a valuable piece of advice/to show off what one treasures
Hanyuan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
Sanwan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
